name: Bear Them!
description:
Bear Them! is a casual arcade game where your goal is to defend your house against the evil bears and bunnies that threaten it... 

Well, actually the goal is to enjoy running over some fluffy zombies with a toy car and shooting them with a turret mounted onto a helicopter :)

Controls (Controller only):

  • Alternate vehicle: Y
  • Alternate camera: X
  • Accelerate/Lift Up/Shoot: Right Trigger
  • Slow Down/Descend: Left Trigger
  • Steer/Move: Left Joystick

ENJOY!
